nodes.text: Arkania was an astronomical object located in the galaxy's Colonies region, positioned at the coordinates M-8 on the Standard Galactic Grid. It shared its name with the creatures known as Arkanian dragons. In the weeks following the Battle of Endor, the New Republic was involved in a battle on Arkania that included ground-level fighting.
Arkania was first mentioned in the Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2016.
In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Arkania first appeared in Tales of the Jedi 1, a comic published in 1993.
